item.title: スポティファイ、フランスでの値上げを計画 ストリーミング配信会社の収益に1.2％の課税を追加する新税法により、現地の音楽制作資金に貢献（ロイター）
item.description:
Reuters:
Spotify plans to raise its prices in France due to a new tax law that adds a 1.2% tax on streaming companies' revenue to help finance local music creation  —  Swedish streaming service Spotify (SPOT.N) on Thursday said it would increase its prices in France due to a new tax, which it argued would fail to accomplish its intended goal.

item.title: 分析：TemuとSheinは米国でFacebook、X、YouTubeの広告に多額の広告費を費やしている。
item.description:
New York Times:
Analysis: Temu and Shein are spending heavily on Facebook, X, and YouTube ads in the US; Temu placed ~1.4M ads globally on Google services in the past year  —  Temu, Shein, and streaming and gaming apps looking to break into the U.S. market are spending huge sums to get their wares in front of American consumers.

item.title: コロラド・パブリック・ラジオ、主にオーディオとポッドキャスト制作部門で15人をレイオフし、ニュースルームの削減を免れる；スタッフは2006年度の48人から2022年度には214人に増加（Ben Markus/Colorado Public Radio）
item.description:
Ben Markus / Colorado Public Radio:
Colorado Public Radio lays off 15, primarily in audio and podcast production, and spares the newsroom of cuts; staff grew from 48 in FY 2006 to 214 in FY 2022  —  Colorado Public Radio laid off 15 employees this week, the largest cut to the public broadcaster's payroll in at least a quarter of a century.

item.title: FTグループCEOジョン・リディング氏とのQ&A：日本経済新聞社傘下のメリット、ニュースルームとエンゲージメントにおけるAIの活用、米国の成長、ビッグ・テックのAIの失策について（Sarah Scire/Nieman Lab）
item.description:
Sarah Scire / Nieman Lab:
Q&A with FT Group CEO John Ridding on the benefits of being owned by Nikkei, using AI in the newsroom and for engagement, US growth, and Big Tech's AI missteps  —  The FT has more than 1.4 million subscribers, including more than 1 million digital subscribers.  About 20% are based in the United States.

item.title: 2021年に撮影監督ハリーナ・ハッチンズが射殺された事件で、陪審団はラストの映画兵器係ハンナ・グティエレスを過失致死罪で有罪にした（Meg James/Los Angeles Times）。
item.description:
Meg James / Los Angeles Times:
A jury finds Rust movie armorer Hannah Gutierrez guilty of involuntary manslaughter in the 2021 accidental shooting death of cinematographer Halyna Hutchins  —  Weapons experts and prosecutor witness Bryan Carpenter, explains in court that he found fault with Alec Baldwin's conduct and use of guns.

item.title: Twitchが2024年の計画を詳述：2019年以来初めてモバイルアプリを再設計し、MODツールや短い動画のアップロード機能などを追加（Will Shanklin/Engadget）
item.description:
Will Shanklin / Engadget:
Twitch details its 2024 plans: redesigning its mobile app for the first time since 2019 to add mod tools, the ability to upload short videos, and more  —  It promises “a more modern, immersive viewing experience” later this year.  —  Twitch is redesigning its mobile app for the first time since 2019.

item.title: ディッシュ・メディアは、ストリーミング・サービスのファイロと広告パートナーシップを結び、ディッシュ・メディアのクライアントがファイロのアドレサブル広告在庫を購入できるようになったと発表した（マシュー・キーズ／The Desk）。
item.description:
Matthew Keys / The Desk:
Dish Media announces it has formed an advertising partnership with streaming service Philo, letting Dish Media clients purchase Philo's addressable ad inventory  —  Dish Media has formed a strategic, advertising-driven partnership with wallet-friendly general entertainment streaming service Philo, the companies announced on Wednesday.

item.title: プログラマティック広告収入の崩壊で閉鎖が相次ぐニュースサイト。「Talking Points Memo」のケーススタディでは、購読料がいかにサイトを存続させたかがわかる（Josh Marshall/Talking Points Memo）
item.description:
Josh Marshall / Talking Points Memo:
News sites are closing due to the collapse of programmatic ad revenue; a case study of Talking Points Memo shows how subscriptions kept the site in business  —  Over the years I've written about structural problems in the digital news industry, often driven by the growth of platform monopolies and other issues.

Memo: Sony Pictures Entertainment promotes Global Television Studios and Corporate Development chairman Ravi Ahuja to president and COO, effective April 1  —  The TV chief, who will take on the expanded role effective April 1, will continue to report to chairman and CEO Tony Vinciquerra
